title: Demonstrators waving Egyptian flags in Mīdān al-Taḥrīr
description: Photographer's description: People waving flags in Tahrir Sqaure in front of a stage in which there were people performing and singing patriotic songs about Egypt and also satirical song that made fun of Mubarak.
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Demonstrators waving Egyptian flags in Mīdān al-Taḥrīr
